mapper.sql: sps.package_specification_id, sps.package_specification_code, sps.package_specification_name, sps.package_specification_desc, sps.package_specification_quantity, sps.material_id, sps.barcode_rule_id, sps.packing_unit_id, sps.status, sps.create_user_id, sps.create_time, sps.modified_user_id, sps.modified_time, sps.is_delete, sps.option1, sps.option2, sps.option3
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, spu.packing_unit_name, spu.packing_unit_desc, sm.material_code, sm.material_desc,sbr.barcode_rule from fantech_imes.smt_package_specification sps LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_packing_unit spu ON sps.packing_unit_id = spu.packing_unit_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_material sm ON sps.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_barcode_rule sbr ON sps.barcode_rule_id = sbr.barcode_rule_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON sps.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON sps.modified_user_id = sus.user_id
and date_format(sps.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and sps.package_specification_code like CONCAT('%', #{packageSpecificationCode}, '%')
and sps.package_specification_name like CONCAT('%', #{packageSpecificationName}, '%')
and sps.package_specification_desc like CONCAT('%', #{packageSpecificationDesc}, '%')
and sps.packing_unit_id=#{packingUnitId}
and spu.packing_unit_name like CONCAT('%', #{packingUnitName}, '%')
and spu.packing_unit_desc like CONCAT('%', #{packingUnitDesc}, '%')
order by sps.create_time desc
